description:
Poise provides discreet protection against bladder leakage with 3in1 protection that a period pad can't provide.

PoiseThin & Discreet Regular Pads have been specifically designed for bladder leaks, with superior 3-in-1 dryness, comfort and odour control which a period pad can’t provide!They offer moderate bladder protection commonly experienced when bending, lifting or exercising. You've got Poise to keep you feeling feminine, confident and in control.

Incredibly Thin & Dry UltraLite™5 layerabsorbent core is 45% thinner than POISE Regular Pads, you’ll barely know it’s there

Rapid-Dry Cover

All day comfort Thin-Flex core designed to holditsshape all day without scrunching, bunching, twisting or curling

Odour Control Instantly and continuouslyneutralisesodours through the Absorb-Loc core

Individually wrapped Hygienic & discreet

Length: 240mm
name: Poise Thin & Discreet Pads For Bladder Leaks Regular 16 Pack
